manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sealed Battery&Safe Charging Manufactured with thick absorbent glass mat (AGM) separators and advanced valve regulated technology, the battery is maintenance-free, leak-proof, and gas-free.Weize SLA batteries are utilized in a wide variety of applications including; Solar Panel Off-Grid Applications, Back-up Sump Pump, Kayak Trolling Motor, RV VAN Camping Trip, Travel Trailer, Golf Carts, Consumer Electronics, Electric Vehicles, Hunting, Fishfinder, Lawn and Garden Tools, Medical Mobility, Portable Tools, Toys and Hobby, Access Control Devices, Emergency Lighting, Security and more.

SLA batteries have a low self-discharge rate - about 40% per year or 3.3% per month. These batteries are able to be stored without charging for up to 5-6 months when at full capacity, but doing so is not recommended. At least every 2-3 months you should top charge them. In order to prolong their shelf life, SLA batteries should be stored and maintained properly. Best Practices Store batteries in a cool, dry place (optimally 75 degrees Fahrenheit / 23 degrees Celsius or less)Periodical top charging of the batteries is recommendedStore batteries in a fully charged state IMPORTANT INFORMATION BEFORE YOU BUY In order to find the best replacement for your original battery you need to compare the physical dimensions, Volts and Amp power of your original model to our battery.Besides physical dimensions you also need to check battery terminals , which are the metal connectors on top of the battery. To determine what terminal your battery has, you will need to look at their form and determine if they have a flat connector, nut and bolt or wires, and then measure their sizes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Value for the Money
reviews.reviewText: Batteries fit like the original size. I had to change my connections to a blade F type, since mine were bolt connectors. After crimping on new connectors, I reinstalled the batteries in the Vibe scooter, and hooked up the charger to see how everything worked. I'm happy to report that the batteries charged completely and powered the scooter like new. For the price, I'm very happy with my purchase. The original batteries cost more for the bolt on connectors, not worth the extra cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good deal for the price.
reviews.reviewText: I bought these batteries to power my Drive Way Gate. I have used several different types and sizes of batteries along with a couple different automatic battery charger/maintainers over the last several years and the batteries have all died to the point they will not hold a charge or even take a charge on some of them. I’ve used standard smaller batteries and even a larger expensive LiPo battery for this application. All of them stop taking a charge after about a year and all of them get to the point the gate doesn’t work or will open part way and stop or will just beep and not move.These batteries are a good price for the pair. I hooked them together in parallel to make a larger single 12V battery. Giving me a 24AH 12V battery. I soldered the wires to the terminals so that there is no voltage drop across a poor connection from spade clips. I also used connectors on the power wire and charging wire that are weather proof as well as can handle the power draw “not that this pulls a lot of power”. Everything is working great. So we will see how long these last. The size of these were small enough to have room inside the battery box that’s buried in the ground next to the gate so that I could space them from all sides and even underneath as well as from eachother. This keeps them from sitting on cold ground and loosing charge and decreasing their life span. Even with the low cost these are worth it. The gate has been working great now for about a week with zero issue.
